channel.title: [Signups - VFM] Purgatory III: The Reckoning! [9/9]
channel.description:
#
:angel: [color=darkgrey] Welcome to Purgatory III: The Reckoning![/color] :smiling_imp:
Hosted by @clonedcheese and @DatBird !
Designated Alt Mod: @DatBird
**_You and 8 others are trapped in purgatory! Can you send the demons to hell or will you doom everything by allowing them into heaven?!_** # Hydra!! Each slot in this game may be composed of up to 2 heads. Each team may choose how they want their hydra to behave. Once you have found a partner or have decided to play solo, here are your options and instructions: 1. Hydra, with both players posting in the thread on their main accounts: enter in the thread, then create a hydra name. 2. Hydra, with 1 account known to be the hydra: sign up in the thread, create a hydra name, then contact Dat + me for the account of that name 3. Hydra, with 1 anonymous account: privately contact dat + myself 4. Solo, public: sign up in the thread. 5. Solo, Anon: privately contact dat + myself # Rules and Punishments Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules - Please Read First](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), and the [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up. Don't angleshoot. Don't be rude. Don't use big letters. The usual. # Gameplay ### The game is played in two phases. [color=lightblue]**Heaven Phase**[/color] and [color=red]**Hell Phase.**[/color] **The Game begins in the [color=red]**Hell Phase.**[/color]** During the [color=red] **Hell Phase**[/color], you must choose a player to send to hell. To vote for someone, simply type **/Vote (Playername)** or **/Send (Playername)**. After someone is sent to hell, their alignment will be revealed and they will be unable to talk in the thread **Votes will be plurality based. _Majority is in effect._ If there is a tie, it will be broken by RNG**. After one player has been sent to hell, the heaven phase will begin. During the [color=lightblue] **Heaven Phase**[/color], you must choose a player to send to Heaven. Voting is done the same way, their alignment will flip and they'll be unable to speak, except for in a private Heaven discord. After the heaven phase, a new hell phase starts and the cycle repeats. **There is no night time in purgatory! Immediately after a flip, the next phase will begin!** **Heaven and Hell phases both have a maximum length of 48 hours. At the end of each phase, if no one has been sent the player with the most votes will be sent. Ties are broken by RNG.** # Victory [color=lightblue]The humans will win if they manage to send the majority (2 of the 3) Demons to hell![/color] [color=red]Demons will win if the majority of them are sent to heaven! [/color] **The Demons will have a private chat where ALL Demons (including those sent to hell/heaven) can communicate at any time.** # [color=orange]Judgement Day[/color] **When 50% of the Living players are demons, a [color=darkorange] Judgement Day[/color] phase begins.** **The Living players lose their ability to vote (but may still speak in the thread). All of the Lost Souls sent to heaven (does not include demons currently in heaven) must privately (NOT IN THE THREAD.) vote to send a player to hell within 24 hours.** **If the player sent is a lost soul, the Demons win!** **If the player sent is a demon, the game proceeds to the next hell phase.** # Role Cards > ### [color=red]Demon[/color] > You win when two demons have snuck into heaven, or when the Lost Souls lose a Judgement Day. > ### [color=grey]Lost Soul[/color] > You win when two demons have been sent to hell. # Role List: **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=red] Demon[/color]** **[color=red] Demon[/color]** **[color=red] Demon[/color]** ### Credit to Marl for setup creation. ## Player List 1. Zone_Q11 2. an_gorta_pratai 3. Moleland 4. Trivial 5. Anagram 6. Yawn 7. Raven 8. Darth Tarbor 9. Wazza ## Specs 1. Marshal 2. Katze 3. Astand 4. Thunal33 5. Arete # Host notes: Found a co-host \o/ If you want to spec/co-host/VC-bot plz message
